resources.string: Install separate or all overlays here
Modify accent color for already installed overlays
Some overlays were updated. Install them.
Changing background requires all overlays to be re-installed. This will take some time and the process will start once you click confirm on the previous screen.
Credits to Projekt Development Team & SlimRoms Ltd for the encryption implementation
Notifications reminds you about updating the overlays for apps you update in Play Store. Are you sure you want to disable them?
After you examined the result, and optionally sent an error log if some overlay failed to install, you need to manually reboot!\n\nYou don\'t need to reboot if all overlays failed to install.

One reason apps fails to install is that the app version doesn\'t match the overlays version. We usually update the theme and add support for new versions within a few days, so please be patient. There\'s an option to send us an error log in the FAB menu.

1. Installing and uninstalling can take a lot of time. Even though it seems stuck, just wait and it\'ll finish.\n\n2. When installing or uninstalling Android overlay some apps might crash. This is expected, and normal. Everything will work fine once you rebooted.
You need to reboot manually to finish uninstall.
You can change to your favourite background and accent color before installing overlays
This guide will explain what Swift Installer is and what it does

A theme contain overlays, and it\'s the overlay that applies on top of an app and themes it. Overlays gets installed as APK\'s on your device. By pressing \'Give\' you acknowledge and accept this. \n\n We also need storage permission as we temporarily place the APK on the storage before installing it. Press \'Give\' to grant the permission.
